item.description:
This may be more of a "music" event than a "film" event, but I thought it might be of interest to some people.

Dean Wareham & Britta Phillips (formerly of the band Luna) will perform their original music to accompany a collection of Warhol's silent screen-test films. More details here.

Since this show is a little late and there may not be much material for discussion, I'm not sure whether I should plan an actual "meetup" afterwards. If people are interested, there is the Legal Test Kitchen not far away. If you sign up please let me know whether you would like to go out afterwards.
item.name: Songs for Andy Warhol's Screen Tests
